author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Attis Industries Secures Commitments From Long Term Care Partners Covering 27 Facilities
text:
May 14 (Reuters) - Attis Industries Inc:
* ATTIS INDUSTRIES SECURES COMMITMENTS FROM LONG TERM CARE PARTNERS COVERING 27 FACILITIES
* ATTIS INDUSTRIES INC - TESTING IS EXPECTED TO OCCUR ON A MONTHLY BASIS IN FACILITIES & YIELD RECURRING REVENUE Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
